definition: surname Li/abbr. for 禮記|礼记[Li3 ji4], Classic of Rites

sentences.english: What's the “first custom” in the international society?
sentences.chinese: 被國際社會公認的“第一禮俗”是什麼？

sentences.english: One of the purposes of funeral customs is the expression of love.
sentences.chinese: 喪葬禮俗其實質之一就是人類對於愛的潛在表達。

sentences.english: Visting parents is an etiquette to pay filial homage to parents.
sentences.chinese: 省親是歸家探望父母的禮俗。

sentences.english: A judge has a formal manner in law court.
sentences.chinese: 在法庭中法官的舉止符合禮俗。

sentences.english: From a historical perspective, it is idealization of a worldly society.
sentences.chinese: 從其歷史內涵上講，它是對於禮俗社會的理想化表達。

definition: principle of people's livelihood, the third of Dr Sun Yat-sen's 孫中山|孙中山 Three Principles of the People 三民主義|三民主义 (at the time, meaning redistribution of wealth, self-sufficiency and internal trade)
to show every possible consideration (idiom); meticulous care
toadying for personal gain/to curry favor/to study in great depth

three principles and five virtues (idiom)/the three rules (ruler guides subject, father guides son and husband guides wife) and five constant virtues of Confucianism (benevolence 仁, righteousness 義|义, propriety 禮|礼, wisdom 智 and fidelity 信)
to spare no effort (idiom); to do one's utmost
lit. no one picks up lost articles in the street (idiom)/fig. honesty prevails throughout society
respect the old and cherish the young
